trips.title: Santorini Adventure
trips.shortDescription: Discover the whitewashed villages and blue domes of Santorini.
trips.description: Spend 5 unforgettable days exploring Santorini — from the iconic caldera sunsets to hidden beaches and ancient ruins. Enjoy authentic Greek cuisine, boat tours, and relaxation on volcanic sands.

trips.title: Norwegian Fjord Cruise
trips.shortDescription: Cruise through the breathtaking fjords of Norway.
trips.description: A 7-day cruise across Norway’s most stunning fjords. Experience waterfalls, glaciers, and mountain views. Includes stops in Bergen, Geiranger, and Flam, with guided excursions and onboard dining.

trips.title: Tokyo Culture Trip
trips.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in modern and traditional Tokyo.
trips.description: Explore both the futuristic and historical sides of Tokyo in this 6-day tour. Visit the Senso-ji Temple, Shibuya Crossing, and indulge in sushi workshops. Includes local transport and accommodation.

trips.title: Bali Wellness Escape
trips.shortDescription: Relax and recharge in the tropical paradise of Bali.
trips.description: Spend 8 days in Bali with yoga sessions, beach relaxation, and cultural exploration. Enjoy massages, temple visits, and fresh Balinese cuisine. Perfect for a full mind-body reset.
